title.narrative: IMPROVED Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH)

description.narrative: Country Offices and partners are supported by MENARO to contribute to significant advances in the equitable and sustainable reduction of Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) service disparities, improvements of household & community resilience to water scarcity/insecurity and protracted crisis, and implementation of UNICEF CCC in Humanitarian Action, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: GRP1: Governments and regional institutions in MENA benefit from UNICEF technical and other support to achieve sustainable results for children and adolescents in development and humanitarian contexts.

sector.narrative: HSS - Risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict
Sanitation - improving services in rural communities (except household water treatment and storage, moving up the ladder and strengthening sustainability)
WASH - risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The WASH section extended support to country offices and partners in MENA region in several areas including technical assistance in development and humanitarian contexts, which contributed to improving access to equitable and sustainable WASH services to children and their families. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:25/01/2018
